publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.W. for Edw. Husband ...,

notesStmt.note: "Ordered by the Commons in Parliament, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Hen. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D.Com."
Place of publication from by Wing (2nd ed.).
Bound and filmed as 8th item with 2753:6-2753:15.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
